name: Friendly Dog
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="dogGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,82,45);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,41,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 350 C 150 250, 400 250, 450 350 C 400 400, 150 400, 100 350 Z" fill="url(#dogGrad)" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="330" r="30" fill="url(#dogGrad)" />
  <path d="M 130 300 L 170 300 L 150 280 Z" fill="url(#dogGrad)" />
  <circle cx="140" cy="320" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="160" cy="320" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: House Cat
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="catGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 350 C 180 250, 380 250, 412 350 C 380 400, 180 400, 150 350 Z" fill="url(#catGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="300" r="40" fill="url(#catGrad)" />
  <path d="M 230 280 L 256 250 L 282 280 Z" fill="url(#catGrad)" />
  <path d="M 240 290 L 256 270 L 272 290 Z" fill="url(#catGrad)" />
  <circle cx="240" cy="300" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="272" cy="300" r="3" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Brown Forest Bear
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="bearGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(139,69,19);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(101,48,15);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="300" r="100" fill="url(#bearGrad)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="220" r="20" fill="url(#bearGrad)" />
  <circle cx="312" cy="220" r="20" fill="url(#bearGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="300" r="30" fill="#333333" />
</svg>

name: Pet Rabbit
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="rabbitGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(240,240,240);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="80" fill="url(#rabbitGrad)" />
  <path d="M 256 270 L 256 100" stroke="url(#rabbitGrad)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 256 270 L 300 100" stroke="url(#rabbitGrad)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <circle cx="240" cy="340" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="272" cy="340" r="3" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Forest Fox
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="foxGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,50,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 350 C 200 250, 400 250, 412 350 C 380 400, 180 400, 150 350 Z" fill="url(#foxGrad)" />
  <circle cx="190" cy="320" r="20" fill="url(#foxGrad)" />
  <path d="M 170 300 L 210 300 L 190 280 Z" fill="url(#foxGrad)" />
  <path d="M 380 350 L 412 300 L 412 400 Z" fill="url(#foxGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Forest Squirrel
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="squirrelGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,100,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,50,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="50" fill="url(#squirrelGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="280" r="40" fill="url(#squirrelGrad)" />
  <path d="M 300 250 Q 350 200, 300 400" stroke="url(#squirrelGrad)" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
</svg>

name: Pet Hamster
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="hamsterGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,220,180);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,170,140);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="350" r="60" fill="url(#hamsterGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="280" r="40" fill="url(#hamsterGrad)" />
  <circle cx="246" cy="270" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="266" cy="270" r="3" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="290" r="5" fill="#FF69B4" />
</svg>

name: Forest Owl
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="owlGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="300" r="80" fill="url(#owlGrad)" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="280" r="15" fill="white" />
  <circle cx="282" cy="280" r="15" fill="white" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="280" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="282" cy="280" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <polygon points="256,300 240,320 272,320 Z" fill="#FFD700" />
</svg>

name: Skunk
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="skunkGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(10,10,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 350 C 180 250, 380 250, 412 350 C 380 400, 180 400, 150 350 Z" fill="url(#skunkGrad)" />
  <path d="M 256 250 L 256 400" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="300" r="30" fill="url(#skunkGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Coiled Snake
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="snakeGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,200,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 200 400 A 100 100 0 1 0 312 400" stroke="url(#snakeGrad)" stroke-width="20" fill="none" />
  <path d="M 312 400 C 350 350, 300 250, 256 200" stroke="url(#snakeGrad)" stroke-width="20" fill="none" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="200" r="10" fill="url(#snakeGrad)" />
  <circle cx="252" cy="198" r="2" fill="#000000" />
</svg>
